item.title: Using Website Metadata for URL Previews in Rmarkdown
item.description: Recently I was creating a list of R resources and thought it might be interesting to replicate website previews seen when including links in twitter of slack posts. If I am honest though, a list of just URLâ€™s is neither interesting nor informative. And I did not want to spend all day looking up extra information about each resource. Most modern websites include a large amount of metadata information embedded in the <head></head> tag.
